Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, reasonable location”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week found convenient accessible car free parking spacious clean corridors bathroom clean reasonable restaurant served okay food offered average breakfast price ambiance location service offer differentiation stops coming

Reviews.Content: booked paid advance double bastion hotel arrived told hotel move near airport didnt else offer discount shuttle airport train arrive city day cost time money stay bastion hotel location hotel center enter staff friendly
